entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:16 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -32.6°C
entry.summary:

Temperature: -32.6°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 69 %

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 39. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h this evening. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:41 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon then periods of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 54 in the morning and minus 49 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:41 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. Wind chill minus 51 in the evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:41 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
